init_session()[source]¶

predict(state)[source]¶

Predict the system action (dialog act) given state. :param state: Dialog state. For more details about the each field of the dialog state, please refer to

the init_state method in convlab/dst/dst_util.py
Returns:
The dialog act of the current turn system response, which is then passed to NLG module to
generate a NL utterance.
Return type:action (dict)
